```jsx
<div>
    <div>Input:  1234567898765432</div>
    <div>Output: <CardNumber value="1234567898765432" /></div>
</div>
```

```jsx
<div>
    <div>Input:  1234 5678 9876 5432 10</div>
    <div>Output: <CardNumber value="1234 5678 9876 5432 10" /></div>
</div>
```

```jsx
<div>
    <div>Input:  **5432</div>
    <div>Output: <CardNumber value="**5432" /></div>
</div>
```

```jsx
<div>
    <div>Input:  •• 5432</div>
    <div>Output: <CardNumber value="•• 5432" /></div>
</div>
```

```jsx
<div>
    <div>Input:  1234******765432</div>
    <div>Output: <CardNumber value="1234******765432" /></div>
</div>
```
